info.title: Property V4
info.description:
[Property V4 Wiki](http://wiki.melissadata.com/index.php?title=Property_V4)

# Overview
Welcome to the Melissa Property V4 Cloud Service.

This service returns information about a given parcel of property, including: assessed value; last sale price; current mortgage; physical dimensions of land; and square footage. The level of detail may vary according to location.

#### You can use Property V4 to:
  * Lookup properties by address, county FIPS and APN (assessor's parcel number) or via the new Melissa Address Key (MAK) in real time
  * Find the owner's name, address and value of the home
  * Learn about the various properties and characteristics of a property such as size, rooms, number of buildings, amenities, improvements, etc.
  * Search through historical deeds for a home to see past buyers and sales
  * Find other properties owned by a homeowner
  
## Fields
### LookupDeeds
#### Input
| Input | Description
| - | -
| Transmission Reference | A unique identifier for the set of records
| License Key | Ident or Encrypted Ident from Melissa
| Columns | Specifies which column(s) to be output
| Format | The desired format of the response (JSON or XML)
| Property MAK | A propietary unique key identifier for an address.
| FreeForm | The free form address.
| FIPS | Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) code for the property.
| APN | Assessor's Parcel Number for the property.
| Transaction ID | Specific transaction ID to specify one deed or transaction.

---

## License Key
You should have been provided an encrypted and unique License Key from Melissa. This is necessary for including with each request to the Property V4 Cloud Service. This value should be put into the License Key element in each Cloud service request.
If you do not have a License Key, please contact your Melissa sales representative at 1-800-MELISSA (1-800-635-4772).

## Choosing a Web Service Protocol
The Melissa Property V4 Cloud Service supports REST and JSON. For the undecided, here are some Pros and Cons of one Web Service protocol over the other.

#### REST
**_Pros:_** REST is lightweight and relies upon HTTP to do its work. If you don't need a strict API definition, this is the way to go. REST is also format-agnostic so you can use XML or JSON as responses.

**_Cons:_** REST can only be used for sending of single records and doesn’t support strict contracts or more involved security. The Response is a JSON document.

#### XML
**_Pros:_** XML allows record set structures of more than one record at a time and has very good support with most languages and browsers. Supports namespaces.

**_Cons:_** Developers need to use tools to serialize/de-serialize the XML structure.

#### JSON
**_Pros:_** JSON relies on simple object serialization based on JavaScript’s object initialization. It is very simple to use with JavaScript and easily parsed and understood by developers.

**_Cons:_** No support for formal definitions. No namespace support. Not much support in Cloud Service clients with some platforms.

## Basic Order of Operations (Pseudo Code)
1. Choose the endpoint based on the service needed.
1. Choose your request format.
2. Create an instance of the request object.
3. Populate the request element "id" with your License Key.
4. Add the required input for your selected endpoint.
5. Call the method and pass in the request to the service using the WEB endpoint.
6. Examine and parse the response from the reply object back from the service.
7. Interpret the results.

## Interpreting Results
Melissa’s Property V4 Cloud service uses Result codes to determine the status of the property.
The Property V4 Cloud Service use the following Results conventions:
* Cloud Service Errors: SExx
* Cloud Transmission Errors: GExx
* Cloud Transmission Warning: GWxx
* Geocode Status Codes: GSxx
* Geocode Error Codes: GExx
* Property Status Codes: YSxx
* Property Error Codes: YExx
* Property Change Codes: YCxx

For Example: A YS02 Result Code means that an address match was found in the data. An FS04 code indicates that match had detailed information returned.
Please check the documentation for any additional information on Result Codes.

## Result Codes
The service returns a series of result codes to tell you of the status of the Business Coder UK matches and any errors found.

For a full list of the Result Codes returned by the Property V4 Cloud Service, see [Property V4 Result Codes](http://wiki.melissadata.com/index.php?title=Result_Code_Details#Property V4)

## Wiki Page
A product support Wiki is available for your convenience. In the Wiki, you will find documentation about the service in more detail.

[Property V4 Cloud Service Wiki Page](http://wiki.melissadata.com/index.php?title=Property_V4)

# Misc. Considerations
## Firewall
If you are behind a firewall, you may need to allow specific IP addresses access in order to communicate with the service.

For a full list of IP Addresses, see [IP Address Information](http://wiki.melissadata.com/index.php?title=IP_Address_Information)

get.description: The LookupDeeds endpoint returns an array of deeds and/or transactions from the recorder table when given either a deed transaction ID or the FIPs and APN.

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Transmission Reference - Serves as a unique identifier for this set of records. This allows you to match a response to a request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: License Key from Melissa

parameters.name: cols
parameters.description: Column - Columns to be output

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of the response.

parameters.name: mak
parameters.description: A propietary unique key identifier for an address.

parameters.name: ff
parameters.description: The free form address.

parameters.name: fips
parameters.description: Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) code for the property.

parameters.name: apn
parameters.description: Assessor's Parcel Number for the property.

parameters.name: txid
parameters.description: Specific transaction ID to specify one deed or transaction.

parameters.name: format

parameters.name: mak

parameters.name: ff
parameters.description: The free form address.
